intro: This document provides a comprehensive description of the European Ground Motion Service (EGMS) products, which are part of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS). It details the specifications, formats, attribute tables, and metadata associated with the EGMS Basic, Calibrated, and Ortho products. The document is intended to enable users to fully understand and utilise EGMS data for visualisation, analysis, and download, with a focus on the InSAR-specific characteristics and processing methodologies employed.
